it.polimi.ingsw.messages.controller

Class ToolCardCMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.messages.Message
      • it.polimi.ingsw.messages.controller.ControllerMessage
        • it.polimi.ingsw.messages.controller.ToolCardCMessage

  • public class ToolCardCMessage
extends ControllerMessage
    Contains the information about the use of a tool card number 4 or 12 as all of them let the player move two dice inside his window pattern from two different positions (x, y) and (x2, y2) to two new ones (a, b) and (a2, b2).

    Contains everything needed to be transformed into a Json string to be sent across the network as a source of information.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ToolCardCMessage

        public ToolCardCMessage()
        Class constructor.

      • ToolCardCMessage

        public ToolCardCMessage(int num,
                        int x,
                        int y,
                        int a,
                        int b,
                        int x2,
                        int y2,
                        int a2,
                        int b2)
        Class constructor specifying the number of the tool card, the coordinates of two dice in the window and where to move them.
        Parameters:
        num - the number of the tool card.
        x - the index of the row where the first die is placed.
        y - the index of the column where the first die is placed.
        a - the index of the row where the first die will be moved to.
        b - the index of the column where the first die will be moved to.
        x2 - the index of the row where the second die is placed.
        y2 - the index of the column where the second die is placed.
        a2 - the index of the row where the second die will be moved to.
        b2 - the index of the column where the second die will be moved to.
